model.label: Inverter Status
model.description: Communicates details about the current behavior of a PWRcell inverter as part of an ESS
model.notes: Length of this model will be used as crude versioning technique for expected future additions

point.label: DC Generator Inhibit
point.description: Allows a DC generator to be inhibited from producing power

symbol.label: DC Generator Not Inhibit
symbol.description: The DC generator is permitted to run and produce power on REbus

symbol.label: DC Generator Inhibit
symbol.description: The DC generator is NOT permitted to run and produce power on REbus
